bibl.title: The Oldest Biblical Manuscript, by 300 Years, Discovered among Egyptian Mummy Wrappings. Papyrus Fragments of "Deuteronomy" (in Greek), Dating from the Second Century B.C.: A Memorable Find (Including also Passages from Homer and Other Papyri) in a Manchester Library.
bibl.seg: Roberts Colin H., The Oldest Biblical Manuscript, by 300 Years, Discovered among Egyptian Mummy Wrappings. Papyrus Fragments of "Deuteronomy" (in Greek), Dating from the Second Century B.C.: A Memorable Find (Including also Passages from Homer and Other Papyri) in a Manchester Library.
